# XmlTypes.ToXmlDocument method

Takes an `XDocument` in and returns an equivalent `XmlDocument`.

```csharp
public static XmlDocument ToXmlDocument(XDocument document)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| document | The input document |

## Return Value

The equivalent `XmlDocument`
